text:
Hi everyone :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m wondering how to add a specific font (Poppins) in HubSpot in order to use it on my landing pages ?
I’m using a free template.
Thanks for your help !

When I edit theme-overrides.css, there is a high probability that the CSS will not be applied, have you all experienced the same thing?
I am using hs watch.
If I delete the entire contents of the file, save it, paste it all back in and save it again, it returns to normal.
Have you checked theme settings already? You should be able to set the font globally with any font from Google, including Poppins
